name: Doughball
description:
Sit back and knead dough in a bakery using a giant pinball machine!

Toss the dough ball around in typical pinball fashion, but make sure to hit the flour sack on the board 4 times to win the game.

If you let the dough slide of the table 3 times- it's game over!

Use the A and D keys to control the left and right flipper. Hold space to shoot the ball on to the board!

Solo project made under USC Games in a week

Music created by my boyfriend, who's too shy to upload his work anywhere on the internet :^)
